description_carte: A fiery knight fueled by ancient volcanic power. Burns foes with passion.
description_visuelle: Knight clad in crimson armor that seems to glow from within. Molten cracks spiderweb across the armor's surface. Wields a flaming greatsword.

skills.name: Ember Strike
skills.description: A quick strike that ignites the enemy, dealing minor damage.

skills.name: Fiery Aura
skills.description: Surrounds Ignis in flames, increasing defense and dealing damage to attackers.

skills.name: Burning Slash
skills.description: A powerful slash that burns the target for several turns.

skills.name: Volcanic Eruption
skills.description: Unleashes the volcanic power within, dealing massive fire damage to all enemies.
